dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, hey, did you see the latest numbers from Kaspi.kz? Mikhail Lomtadze, the CEO, um, just dropped some pretty big news.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, hey, did you see the latest numbers from Kaspi dot k z? Mikhail Lomtadze, the C E O, um, just dropped some pretty big news.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mikhail Lomtadze, CEO and co-founder of Kaspi.kz, commented:

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, I did! That 8.5 million monthly users for their Super App, right? That's, like, huge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, I did! That eight point five million monthly users for their Super App, right? That's, like, huge.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our Kaspi.kz Super App has now reached 8.5 million monthly users, further cementing its market leading position.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly. It really, uh, cements their market-leading position. And he mentioned their e-Commerce platform is the biggest in the country.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly. It really, uh, cements their market-leading position. And he mentioned their e-Commerce platform is the biggest in the country.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our e-Commerce platform, the largest e-commerce business in the country, is seamlessly integrated into our app and our team continues to work tirelessly to improve user experience.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Which is seamlessly integrated into the app, which is cool. And they've really expanded, like, delivery to 54 cities now, and almost 400,000 products.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is seamlessly integrated into the app, which is cool. And they've really expanded, like, delivery to fifty four cities now, and almost four hundred thousand products.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We have expanded delivery to 54 cities and increased the range of products to almost 400,000.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I know, right? But get this: for the first eight months of the year, users made 2.6 million online purchases. That's, um, almost 200 billion tenge!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know, right? But get this: for the first eight months of the year, users made two point six million online purchases. That's, um, almost two hundred billion tenge!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For the first eight months of this year, our users made 2.6 million online purchases for almost 200 billion tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Wow, that's a lot of tenge! And the growth, like, 125% increase in amount, 150% in number of purchases. That's insane.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, that's a lot of tenge! And the growth, like, one hundred twenty five percent increase in amount, one hundred fifty percent in number of purchases. That's insane.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The amount of purchases grew 125%, the number of purchases by 150% compared to last year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It really is. And, you know, in the context of all those retail restrictions from the pandemic, he called their e-Commerce platform, uh, 'an essential partner.'
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really is. And, you know, in the context of all those retail restrictions from the pandemic, he called their e-Commerce platform, uh, 'an essential partner.'
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the context of retail restrictions related to the coronavirus pandemic, our e-Commerce platform is an essential partner for many companies in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, for so many companies in Kazakhstan. Helping retailers, like, increase sales and grow their business.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, for so many companies in Kazakhstan. Helping retailers, like, increase sales and grow their business.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We are helping our retailers increase their sales, grow their business and retain jobs.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And retain jobs, which is huge! I mean, it's not just about sales.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And retain jobs, which is huge! I mean, it's not just about sales.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We are helping our retailers increase their sales, grow their business and retain jobs.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. And the brands on there? I was surprised. Like Adidas, O'STIN, UGG, New Balance...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. And the brands on there? I was surprised. Like Adidas, O'S T I N, U G G, New Balance...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Such well-known international brands as Adidas, O'STIN, UGG, New balance, SPORTMASTER, KOTON, ALDO, SKECHERS, Ecco, DECATHLON, DeFacto, Marks & Spencer, Nike, Reebok and many others sell through Kaspi.kz e-Commerce platform.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, and Nike, Reebok, Marks & Spencer! All those big international names.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, and Nike, Reebok, Marks and Spencer! All those big international names.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Such well-known international brands as Adidas, O'STIN, UGG, New balance, SPORTMASTER, KOTON, ALDO, SKECHERS, Ecco, DECATHLON, DeFacto, Marks & Spencer, Nike, Reebok and many others sell through Kaspi.kz e-Commerce platform.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but also, um, they're working with popular domestic brands too, like Qazaq Republic for clothing, and BALAUSA Jewellery.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but also, um, they're working with popular domestic brands too, like Qazaq Republic for clothing, and B A L A U S A Jewellery.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kaspi.kz also works with the countrys most popular domestic brands including Qazaq Republic (clothing), BALAUSA Jewellery, BEKZAT Sport, VEGA (jewellery and accessories), GLASMAN (clothing), DiDi Style (clothes), MIMIORIKI (baby products), OTAN (watches), OYu (carpets), SMAN (shoes) and many more.

dialogue_turns.text: Right, and even GLASMAN, DiDi Style. A really good mix.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and even G L A S M A N, DiDi Style. A really good mix.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kaspi.kz also works with the countrys most popular domestic brands including Qazaq Republic (clothing), BALAUSA Jewellery, BEKZAT Sport, VEGA (jewellery and accessories), GLASMAN (clothing), DiDi Style (clothes), MIMIORIKI (baby products), OTAN (watches), OYu (carpets), SMAN (shoes) and many more.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And all this, uh, is part of that TOP KZ Retail E-Commerce ranking by Forbes Kazakhstan, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And all this, uh, is part of that T O P K Z Retail E-Commerce ranking by Forbes Kazakhstan, right?
